get.description: Lists all the available REST API operations.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to be used with the HTTP request.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the Lockbox requests in the given subscription.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The $filter OData query parameter. Only filter by request status is supported, e.g $filter=properties/status eq 'Pending'

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000)

200.description: Successfully listed the Lockbox requests under the given subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000)

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to be used with the HTTP request.

200.description: Retrieval of Customer Lockbox request successful.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Update Customer Lockbox request approval status API

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000)

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to be used with the HTTP request.

requestBody.description: The approval object to update request status.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

decision.description: Approval decision to the Lockbox request.

Approval.description: Request content object, in the use of Approve or Deny a Lockbox request.

ErrorAdditionalInfo.description: An error additional info for the Lockbox service.

additionalInfo.description: A list of error details about the error.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

target.description: The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in error.

ErrorBody.description: An error response body from the Lockbox service.

ErrorResponse.description: An error response from the Lockbox service.

id.description: The Arm resource id of the Lockbox request.

name.description: The name of the Lockbox request.

type.description: The type of the Lockbox request.

LockboxRequestResponse.description: A Lockbox request response object, containing all information associated with the request.

createdDateTime.description: The creation time of the request.

duration.description: The duration of the request in hours.

expirationDateTime.description: The expiration time of the request.

requestedResourceIds.description: A list of resource IDs associated with the Lockbox request separated by ','.

resourceType.description: The resource type of the requested resources.

supportCaseUrl.description: The url of the support case.

supportRequest.description: The id of the support request associated.

LockboxRequestResponseProperties.description: The properties that are associated with a lockbox request.

description.description: The localized friendly description for the operation.

operation.description: The localized friendly name for the operation.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name.

resource.description: The localized friendly form of the resource type related to this action/operation.

display.description: Contains the localized display information for this particular operation / action.

isDataAction.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether it is a data plane action

Operation.description: Operation result model for ARM RP

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

value.description: List of Customer Lockbox operations supported by the Microsoft.StreamAnalytics resource provider.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list Customer Lockbox operations. It contains a list of operations.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

value.description: A list of Lockbox requests. Populated by a 'List' operation.

RequestListResult.description: Object containing a list of streaming jobs.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to be used with the HTTP request.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000)
